item.title: LaTeX Settings for VSCode
item.description: Pre-requisites # VSCode (or any other compatible fork) James Yu’s LaTeX Workshop extension An installation of a LaTeX distribution (such as TeXLive) LuaLaTeX/LuaTeX (or your preferred LaTeX compiler) latexmk Settings # The following JSON code can be added to either the projects settings at .
